remarks: The size of the set exponential of two finite sets is the exponential of their sizes.  (This is the original motivation behind the notation for set exponentiation.)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Aug-2014.)
statement: hashmap $p |- ( ( A e. Fin /\ B e. Fin ) -> ( # ` ( A ^m B ) ) = ( ( # ` A ) ^ ( # ` B ) ) ) $.
